00111 /* Print with format extension: bBCDHMNOPQrRSUYwW
00112 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00113 '%b': print bool ("true" or "false")
00114 '%B': print bit conversion of integer
00115 '%C': print formatted char
00116 '%H': print name host
00117 '%M': print memory dump
00118 '%N': print name program
00119 '%P': print pid process
00120 '%Q': sign for call to exit() or abort() (var-argument is param to exit)
00121 '%r': print u_getExitStatus(exit_value)
00122 '%R': print var-argument (msg) "-" u_getSysError()
00123 '%S': print formatted string
00124 '%O': print formatted temporary string + free(string)
00125 '%U': print name login user
00126 '%Y': print u_getSysSignal(signo)
00127 '%w': print current working directory
00128 '%W': print COLOR (index to ANSI ESCAPE STR)
00129 
00130 '%D': print date and time in various format
00131 
00132 with flag '#' => var-argument
00133 with flag '1' => format: %d/%m/%y
00134 with flag '2' => format:                         %T (=> "%H:%M:%S)
00135 with flag '3' => format:                         %T (=> "%H:%M:%S) +n days
00136 with flag '4' => format: %d/%m/%y %T
00137 with flag '5' => format: %d/%m/%Y %T
00138 with flag '6' => format: %d%m%y_%H%M%S_millisec (for file name, backup, etc...)
00139 with flag '7' => format: %a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S          (HTTP header)
00140 
00141                         default format: %a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S GMT (HTTP header) (use u_now)
00142 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 */
00144 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t u_printf_string_max_length; /* default = 256 */
00145 
00146 extern U_EXPORT void        u_printf(                                    const char* format, ...);
00147 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t  u_snprintf(char* buffer, uint32_t buffer_size, const char* format, ...);
00148 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t u_vsnprintf(char* buffer, uint32_t buffer_size, const char* format, va_list argp);
